SEARCH
Package sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller

Class CourseController

java.lang.Object
sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller.CourseController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/course") public class CourseController extends Object
Controller for managing courses.

  • Method Details

    • deleteCourse

      @GetMapping(value="/deleteCourse", produces="application/json") @Transactional public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller.SetResponse> deleteCourse(@RequestParam String courseId, @RequestParam String userId)
      Deletes a course by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course to be deleted.
      userId - The ID of the user requesting the deletion.
      Returns:
      A response indicating whether the deletion was successful.

      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course to be retrieved.
      Returns:
